death.attack.emerald.player: %s was killed by emerald splash by %s
death.attack.soul_flame.player: %s has its soul burnt out by %s
effect.l2complements.bleed.description: Make the entity lose attack and speed, and damage the entity every 3 seconds. Stacks when applied.
effect.l2complements.cleanse.description: Clear all potion effects and make the entity immune to potion effects.
effect.l2complements.emerald_splash.desc: Attack all surrounding enemies. Damage is based on currently player stats and weapons.
effect.l2complements.flame.description: Continuously damage the entity. Bypass fire resistance, but fire-based mobs are immune to this.
effect.l2complements.frozen.description: Slow down entity, and freeze them as if they are on powdered snow.
effect.l2complements.stone_cage.descript: Immobilize the entity. Making it cannot move and unaffected by external forces.
enchantment.l2complements.cursed_blade.d: Apply cursed effect to target. Higher levels have longer duration.
enchantment.l2complements.dampened.desc: When wearing 4 pieces of armors with dampened effect, cancel all vibrations emitted by wearer.
Armor will have higher durability. Conflict with Unbreaking.
enchantment.l2complements.ender_mask.des: Endermen won't be mad at you for direct eye contact
enchantment.l2complements.ender_reach.de: Teleport mined items and mob drops to inventory if possible.
enchantment.l2complements.environment_re: Make wearer immune to damage without attacker.
enchantment.l2complements.eternal.desc: Item will ignore all durability damage.
enchantment.l2complements.explosion_reje: Make wearer immune to explosion damage.
enchantment.l2complements.fire_reject.de: Make wearer immune to fire damage.
enchantment.l2complements.hardened.desc: Durability loss will be capped to 1.
enchantment.l2complements.ice_blade.desc: Apply freezing effect to target. Higher levels have longer duration.
enchantment.l2complements.ice_thorn.desc: Apply freezing effect to attacker. Higher levels have longer duration.
enchantment.l2complements.invincible.des: Player is invincible to all damage.
enchantment.l2complements.life_mending.d: When healing, cost heal amount to repair item first.
enchantment.l2complements.life_sync.desc: Cost health instead of durability when possible. May kill the user
enchantment.l2complements.magic_reject.d: Make wearer immune to magic damage.
enchantment.l2complements.owner_protecti: Negate all damages from entities owned by you.
enchantment.l2complements.plane_eater.de: Dig 16x16 chunk-aligned blocks at once for %s layers
enchantment.l2complements.projectile_rej: Deflects all projectiles. Make wearer immune to projectile damage.
enchantment.l2complements.safeguard.desc: when item has more than 1 durability, it will keep at least 1 durability if damaged
enchantment.l2complements.sharp_blade.de: Stack bleeding effect to target. Higher levels have higher stack cap.
Armor invisible to mobs and players when wearer has invisibility effect.
enchantment.l2complements.smelt.desc: Smelt mined items and mob drops if possible, including items in chests!
enchantment.l2complements.snow_walker.de: Allow Wearer to walk on powdered snow.
enchantment.l2complements.soul_flame_bla: Apply flame effect to target. Higher levels have higher damage.
enchantment.l2complements.soul_flame_tho: Apply flame effect to attacker. Higher levels have higher damage.
enchantment.l2complements.stable_body.de: Player won't be knocked back when wearing chestplate with this enchantment.
enchantment.l2complements.vien_mining.de: Dig connected blocks of the same type, up to %s blocks
enchantment.l2complements.void_touch.des: Have a small chance to deal true damage. Chance increase significantly if the damage bypasses armor or magic already.
l2complements.jei.burnt.title: Burning
l2complements.jei.diffuse.title: Diffusion
l2complements.msg.delay_warning: Your tool needs %s to break more than %s blocks
l2complements.tooltip.ench.tree: Breaks leaves as well, and doesn't cost durability when breaking leaves
l2complements.tooltip.misc.blackstone_co: Obtained by killing a Piglin Brute that has Incarceration effect.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.captured_shul: Obtained by right clicking shulker bullet with Wind Bottle.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.captured_wind: Obtained by moving faster than %s blocks per second while having Wind Bottle in hand or inventory.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.charge_throw: Right click to throw at target
l2complements.tooltip.misc.diffusion_wan: Right click a block of gem/dust to diffuse it into nearby stones to create ore. Check JEI for recipe
l2complements.tooltip.misc.explosion_cha: Create explosion of level %s on Hit
l2complements.tooltip.misc.explosion_sha: Obtained by surviving an explosion damage of at least %s.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.float: This item will float in the air.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.force_field: Obtained by killing a wither with arrow.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.guardian_eye: Dropped when Elder Guardian is killed by lightning strike.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.guardian_rune: Right click guardian to turn it into an elder guardian.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.hard_ice: Obtained by killing a Drowned with Powdered Snow.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.hellfire_wand: Hold use to start. Gradually grows a ring of fire on target position. On release, damage all mobs inside the ring.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.piglin_rune: Right click piglin to turn it into a piglin brute.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.resonant_feat: Obtained when a chicken survives a sonic boom attack.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.sonic_shooter: Hold use to charge. Shoot sonic boom automatically when charged to full. Damage all mobs in front of you.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.soul_flame: Obtained by killing a ghast with soul flame.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.space_shard: Obtained by causing a projectile damage of at least %s.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.storm_core: Obtained by killing a Phantom with explosion.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.sun_membrane: Obtained by killing a sun-burning Phantom %s blocks above max build height.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.totem_dream: Return players back to home when triggers, and becomes a fragile warp stone to go back. Valid against void damage. Also heal player to full health.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.totem_eternal: Reusable Totem of Dream with cool down of %s seconds
l2complements.tooltip.misc.totem_sea: It's stackable, but can only be triggered when in water or rain.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.void_eye: Obtained by killing an angry Enderman %s block below the void. This item kill holder in void, collect it with care.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.warden_bone_s: Dropped when Warden is killed by player.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.warp_record: Right click to record position. After that, right click to teleport. Durability: %s
l2complements.tooltip.misc.warp_teleport: Right click in inventory or UI to teleport. Durability: %s
l2complements.tooltip.misc.wind_bottle: Used to obtain Captured Wind or Captured Bullet.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.winterstorm_w: Hold use to create a ring of storm. Push mobs away and freeze them.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.poseidite_arm: When user is in rain or water: provides extra protection, walk/swim speed boost, and conduit/dolphin grace effect.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.poseidite_too: Sharper and faster when user is in rain or water. Effective against water based mobs and mobs sensitive to water.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.sculkium_armo: Dampened: When wearing 4 pieces of armors with dampened effect, cancel all vibrations emitted by wearer.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.sculkium_tool: Breaks all breakable blocks for the same speed. Be aware of the breaking level.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.shulkerate_to: Really durable. Not easily damaged. Increase Reach and Attack distance
l2complements.tooltip.tool.totemic_armor: Heal user when damaged. Regenerate health over time.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.totemic_tool: Heal user when used. Effective against undead mobs.
